channel.title: How to add a new pk area?
channel.description:
Hello, How u add a new PK-Area? In edville for RichScape.
Please help me, thank you very much that you help me. :rolleyes:

item.title: How to add a new pk area?
item.dc:creator: @darkmen199 darkmen199
item.description:
@darkmen199 wrote:

Ok, Thanks! But… Where in client.java u need to add it?? :D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 29, 2008, 08:14:42 AM[/size][hr]And… u know the cords from Edgville?

item.source: How to add a new pk area?

item.title: How to add a new pk area?
item.dc:creator: @hah_bah_gee hah bah gee
item.description:
@hah_bah_gee wrote:

just make a new command in your client.java that looks like this:

        } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pk")) {
            if(teleblock == true){
               sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); //made by Musicmad441
            } else {
		teleportToX = XCOORDINATE HERE;
		teleportToY = YCOORDINATE HERE;
		sendMessage("You teleport to the Solo pk area. If you pile here you get banned.");
   	    }

change the x and y coords to whatever you want, then compile and run, and jsut type ::pk to get there…

Read full topic
